resources.name: Safe Refuge - Transitional Housing
resources.description: Provides six months to one year of furnished, alcohol-and-drug-free transitional housing apartments for individuals in recovery and reentry in Long Beach.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Individuals in recovery from substance abuse and those in reentry from incarceration. Must maintain sobriety and comply with program rules.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Long Beach reentry resources housing'

resources.name: LA County Probation - Office of Diversion and Reentry (Pasadena)
resources.description: Provides permanent supportive housing and reentry services to individuals with mental health and/or substance use disorders who are or have been incarcerated in LA County Jail. Part of the county's ODR Housing Court program.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Individuals who are homeless, have mental health and/or substance use disorders, and are or have been incarcerated in LA County Jail. Referred through ODR Housing Court program.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Pasadena reentry services Los Angeles County'

resources.name: California Department of Rehabilitation (DOR) - Pasadena Office
resources.description: State vocational rehabilitation agency providing services and advocacy for employment, independent living, and equality for individuals with disabilities, including reentry populations, veterans with disabilities, and individuals in substance abuse recovery.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Individuals with disabilities seeking employment. Serves reentry population, veterans with disabilities, and individuals recovering from substance abuse. Must have a disability that is a barrier to employment.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Pasadena reentry services'

resources.name: Pomona Valley America's Job Center of California (AJCC)
resources.description: Comprehensive employment and training center providing job search assistance, skills training, career counseling, and resources for job seekers including those with barriers to employment such as criminal records.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Open to all job seekers. Serves individuals with barriers to employment including those with criminal records. No income restrictions.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Pomona employment services reentry'

resources.name: Verdugo Jobs Center
resources.description: Workforce development center serving Burbank, Glendale, and La Cañada Flintridge. Provides free employment services including job search assistance, training, and resources for job seekers with barriers to employment including formerly incarcerated individuals.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Open to all job seekers in Glendale, Burbank, and La Cañada Flintridge. Provides services suited to ex-offenders and other populations with barriers to employment.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Glendale Burbank reentry resources'

resources.name: Catholic Charities of Los Angeles - Glendale Community Services Center
resources.description: Provides rental and utility assistance, case management, food pantry services, and supportive services to low-income individuals and families in the Glendale area.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Low-income individuals and families in need of emergency assistance. Income eligibility requirements vary by program.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Glendale Burbank reentry resources'

resources.name: Salvation Army - Glendale Corps Community Center
resources.description: Faith-based community center providing emergency assistance, social services, and support programs for individuals and families in need in the Glendale area.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Individuals and families in need in the Glendale area. Services vary by program.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Glendale Burbank reentry resources'

resources.name: San Gabriel Valley Service Center
resources.description: Multi-purpose LA County facility providing health, educational, social, and recreational services. Offers employment services and supportive programs for reentry populations in the San Gabriel Valley region.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Open to all residents of San Gabriel Valley. Senior employment services available. Reentry services for formerly incarcerated individuals.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'San Gabriel Valley reentry services employment'

resources.name: Partnership for Re-Entry Program (PREP)
resources.description: Catholic Archdiocese of Los Angeles restorative justice ministry providing self-help correspondence courses for prison inmates and reintegration support for parolees to successfully return to the community.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Prison inmates (correspondence courses) and individuals on parole. Catholic ministry but serves all who need support.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Catholic Charities Los Angeles reentry' (identified as separate Archdiocese program)

resources.name: Salvation Army Adult Rehabilitation Center - Santa Monica
resources.description: Residential substance abuse rehabilitation program providing recovery services, life skills training, work therapy, and spiritual guidance. Free 180-day program for adults struggling with addiction.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Adults 18+ with substance abuse issues. Must be willing to participate in work therapy and faith-based programming. 24/7 intake available.
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'Salvation Army Los Angeles reentry rehabilitation'

resources.name: LA Conservation Corps
resources.description: Empowers young adults ages 18-26 with paid job training, high school diploma program, vocational education, and support services. Provides hands-on experience in conservation, urban forestry, recycling, and disaster response.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Young adults ages 18-26 at enrollment. Serves approximately 500 Corpsmembers annually. Priority for youth with barriers to employment.
resources.fees: Free - participants are paid for their work
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'LA Conservation Corps youth employment'

resources.name: YouthSource Center - Coalition for Responsible Community Development (CRCD)
resources.description: Free employment and training services for youth ages 16-24 including job readiness, career coaching, educational support, and job placement. Serves South Los Angeles with focus on underserved communities.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Youth ages 16-24 in Los Angeles. Priority for out-of-school youth and those with barriers to employment. All services completely free.
resources.fees: Free - all services at no cost
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'YouthSource Centers Los Angeles youth employment'

resources.name: YouthSource Center - Watts Labor Community Action Committee (WLCAC)
resources.description: Free comprehensive employment and education services for youth ages 16-24 including job training, career counseling, educational support, and work experience programs in Watts and surrounding South LA communities.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Youth ages 16-24 in Los Angeles, particularly Watts and South LA communities. Priority for out-of-school youth and those facing barriers to employment. All services free.
resources.fees: Free - all services at no cost
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'YouthSource Centers Los Angeles youth employment'

resources.name: YouthSource Center - Catholic Charities AYES (Archdiocesan Youth Employment Services)
resources.description: Free employment services for youth ages 16-24 including job readiness training, career exploration, educational support, and job placement through Catholic Charities' youth employment program.
resources.eligibility_requirements: Youth ages 16-24 in Los Angeles. Priority for out-of-school youth and those with barriers to employment. Services free regardless of religious affiliation.
resources.fees: Free - all services at no cost
resources.discovery_notes: Found via Google search: 'YouthSource Centers Los Angeles'

notes: Fifth research batch for Los Angeles, CA expansion. Geographic expansion to Long Beach, Pasadena, Pomona, Glendale/Burbank, San Gabriel Valley. Focus on employment services (AJCC, job centers, YouthSource), youth programs (ages 16-26), substance abuse treatment (Salvation Army ARC), and regional coverage. All contact information verified from organization websites and official sources.
